ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Movingâ€™s a drag! Relocate to this satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

name: A Little to the Left: Drawers

editorialNotes.standard: Neatly arranging fountain pens and acrylic paints not only declutters drawers and cupboards but also soothes our minds.

name: A Little to the Left: Stars

editorialNotes.standard: Solve puzzles, inspect chilling notes and videos, and outrun a nightmarish smiling cat in the third chapter of this freaky horror series.

Years after its debut, The Room remains one of the most absorbing puzzlers weâ€™ve played. Use ingenuity and intuitive controls to manipulate a series of nested boxes and unlock the secret inside. As each thrown switch and decrypted code reveals another intricate enigma, breathtaking sights and eerie sounds weave an irresistible atmosphere of suspense. All the more amazing for being the debut effort from Fireproof Games, The Room beautifully blurs the line between entertainment and artistry.

Imagination becomes reality in 5th Cellâ€™s spectacular puzzlerâ€”just write the name of almost anything in a magical notebook, and it appears before you. Expanding on the more linear Scribblenauts Remix, this game turns you loose to explore an open world. By creating everything from flying pigs to rocket launchers, you solve problems big and small for the people you meet. As the freedom to roam met the freedom to create, we got lost in coming up with the zaniest, most outlandish, or sometimes most diabolical ways to solve each scenario.

editorialNotes.tagline: Jump in and save the ninjas!
editorialNotes.standard: Goofy banter, diverting puzzles, wall-to-wall actionâ€”we couldnâ€™t ask for more from a LEGO Ninjago game. Using the warriorsâ€™ trademark weapons and elemental moves, youâ€™ll battle the nefarious Ronin and his crew across Chenâ€™s Island, the Toxic Bogs, and other familiar settings. Even if youâ€™ve never seen the Masters of Spinjitzu animated series, these hilarious heroes and their kid-friendly shenanigans are guaranteed to win you over.

After a long day at work, itâ€™s bath time! But Swampyâ€™s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.Â

editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

editorialNotes.standard: When dinosaurs collide with LEGO bricks, you donâ€™t have to be Mr. DNA to know the result is pure fun. Starring characters and creatures from all four Jurassic Park movies, this fantastic adventure lets you relive your favorite moments from the series and even create new ones with your own custom dinos. Full of all the humor, action, and surprises you expect, itâ€™s a wacky team-up of T-Rex proportions.

editorialNotes.short: Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Mesmerizing from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, youâ€™ll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. Itâ€™s a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwoâ€™s adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vinci's gadgetry in this escape room puzzle seriesâ€™ fantastic conclusion.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little â€œbooâ€ in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.

Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters, and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative, and an excellent touch-screen control system, itâ€™s as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The enchantingly eccentric Rusty Lake series heads underground! Solve strange puzzles in train stations representing different eras of a womanâ€™s life.

name: Smart Baby Shapes: Learning games for toddler kids

editorialNotes.standard: Now hereâ€™s how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this seriesâ€”its chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles, and beautiful visualsâ€”while making masterful enhancements. Itâ€™s no wonder itâ€™s an Honorable Mention for Best Mobile Game at this yearâ€™s Game Developers Conference. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.
editorialNotes.short: Brilliant puzzle designs and a haunting atmosphere make this unforgettable.

editorialNotes.standard: A terrific follow-up to our 2012 iPad Game of the Year, The Room Two continues the dark, foreboding tale introduced in its predecessor. Marvelously detailed graphics and eerie music make this first-person puzzler feel stunningly real, and as you travel from an ancient crypt to a sÃ©ance room and beyond, youâ€™ll love unlocking the secrets of every objectâ€”and learning more about your mysterious imprisonment.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Explore a gorgeous island packed with intricately interwoven puzzles. Thereâ€™s a subtle logic to the world design that connects structures, land configurations, and puzzle grids. For persistent adventurers, The Witness is an unforgettable experience.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Talk about a sticky situation! Build structures with all sorts of goo to stretch this long-awaited physics puzzling sequel to new heights.

ios.subtitle: A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldnâ€™t wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beautyâ€”and this sequel didnâ€™t let us down. With its striking colors and level design, itâ€™s even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what weâ€™ll remember most, thoughâ€”their relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: A powerful bond between mother and child drives this gorgeous, unforgettable game.

editorialNotes.standard: Sewing patterns on quilts so adorable kitties will curl up on them for a nap? Board games donâ€™t get much cozier than this.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Cool features like asynchronous multiplayer uplift the mobile version of this hit tabletop word association game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: In Baba Is Youâ€™s brilliant puzzles, rules are meant to be brokenâ€”or at least rewritten. Brick wall standing between you and the victory flag? Shift blocks of text to form phrases that change the way the world works. With a few moves, â€œwall is stopâ€ becomes â€œwall is pushâ€â€”and success is suddenly within your grasp. Youâ€™ll marvel as the game responds instantly to your newly created laws. Spell yourself into a corner? Just rewind and retrace your steps. Baba is you, and youâ€™re in charge.

We love how Moncageâ€™s puzzles show the importance of seeing things from different perspectives. The storytelling vignettes packed into the faces of a rotating cube connect and combine in ever-evolving, surprising ways, and the challenge of making those connections sparks creativity and renders the impossible suddenly possible. Rarely has the concept of thinking outside the box been illustrated so well.

You might get stuck the first time you play Gorogoa. But once the gears of your brain settle into the right configurations, youâ€™ll see how smart this mix of art and perspective really is. Layers pile upon layers, doors transport you between realities, strange creatures and wild environments blend together into a fascinating interactive collage youâ€™ll want to peel apart to discover what lies underneath.
Tug, twist, and bend orbits to reach harmonic chimes in this meditative musical puzzler.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream

editorialNotes.standard: Use curious elevators to cross beautiful buildings in a puzzler thatâ€™s as stylish as it is confounding.

Donut County is an absolute treat. You drag holes across land to collect bigger and bigger aboveground objects, from puddles and fire pits to trees and boulders. New ideas change gameplay in intriguing ways, and concepts never overstay their welcome, making every puzzle feel new and interesting. The consequences of every hole you control propel a wonderfully quirky story about a suddenly subterranean society seeking a return to the surface. Along with the gameâ€™s fantastic visual style and marvelous soundtrack, its every idiosyncrasy miraculously blends into an inviting, cohesive whole.
editorialNotes.short: Geneva Hodgson: Story editor, Donut County

editorialNotes.standard: State of Playâ€™s brilliant adventure game lets you journey through a spellbinding paper world that has to be seen to be believed. Created in a complex process thatâ€™s part origami and part stop motion, Lumino Cityâ€™s highly polished environments come to life like nothing youâ€™ve ever seen. But itâ€™s not just the backdrops that captivateâ€”this unique point-and-click adventure melds clever puzzles with a heartwarming story to powerful effect.
editorialNotes.short: Explore a beautiful handmade city in this stunning puzzler.

editorialNotes.standard: Feed a pet lizard, track down the moon, and struggle with furniture while solving hand-drawn puzzles in these surreal scenarios.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The solutions are as surreal as the landscapes in this curious hand-drawn adventure.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Laugh (and groan) at pop-culture references while solving supernatural crimes in this unabashedly silly point-and-click adventure.

ios.subtitle: Let the rhythm fill your soul

editorialNotes.standard: This chilled-out title has a rhythm all of its own. By dropping tiny spirits into place, youâ€™re not just solving the puzzle â€“ youâ€™re adding beats to the jam. Sit back, pop on your headphones and enjoy the relaxed grooves as you work your way through some delightfully animated levels.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Get to know your enemyâ€”and try to predict their behaviorâ€”as you solve puzzles in this adventure gameâ€™s top-down dungeons.

If you can doodle, you can play this one-of-a-kind Apple Design Award winner. Just draw a lineâ€”any lineâ€”and watch it spring to life across the screen, following your gestures to collect colored dots and avoid black holes. But as the holes form increasingly elaborate obstacles, only the most ingenious doodles will do. With endless solutions to every challenge, itâ€™s a stylish, supremely satisfying test of your creativity and puzzle-solving prowess.

A rare kind of triumph, Prune takes a simple ideaâ€”pruning treesâ€”and shapes it into a creative, deeply playable puzzle game. The visuals echo the style of Japanese painting in striking fashion, and the beautiful music instills a contemplative tone as you swipe to trim the limbs of a rapidly growing tree and guide it around obstacles. Thereâ€™s no frantic pace, no demanding skills to masterâ€”only a quietly bewitching and unforgettable experience.
editorialNotes.short: A contemplative and creative experience - trimming trees has never been so beautiful.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Imagine WALLÂ·E directed by Tim Burtonâ€”thatâ€™s the weird, wonderful world of Machinarium. But this cute robotâ€™s quest for love combines tons more influencesâ€”like point-and-click adventures, hidden-object puzzlers, and comic booksâ€”for a truly unique experience. Challenging but full of awesome â€œaha!â€ moments, itâ€™s an artistic odyssey that looks amazing on iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV.

Railboundâ€™s tough puzzles are brilliantly focused. Youâ€™re given only a handful of rail tiles to guide train cars to the correct destinations in the correct order, and yet even with limited options the potential solutions feel limitless. Do you lay track so Car 4 goes through a tunnel and waits at a crossing gate for Cars 2 and 3 to pass? Do you create loops to delay Car 2? Do you ignore the crossing gate altogether? Few games make success feel like itâ€™s always just within reach, even when it isnâ€™t. A helpful hint system keeps the difficulty from going completely off the rails.

In reimagining the classic Tomb Raider games, Square Enix built a turn-based puzzler thatâ€™s both true to its roots and completely fresh. This Apple Design Award winner pairs a gorgeous art style with super-fun gameplay where you avoid traps and collect relics. The experience feels so perfect for iOS, it was also our 2015 iPhone Game of the Year.
editorialNotes.short: Take one of gaming's iconic heroines on an epic puzzle-solving adventure.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: A clever way to play with light
editorialNotes.standard: What secrets lie in the shadows of this Apple Design Awardâ€“winning puzzler? By twisting and turning unfathomable objects, you cast shadows on beautifully rendered backgrounds; manipulate them just right and youâ€™ll find shapes youâ€™d never have expectedâ€”from rabbits to wrenches. Soothing ambient music and thematic backdrops make completing each challenge as much meditation as entertainmentâ€”while timers and achievements give each level a competitive feel.
editorialNotes.short: With stunning visuals and satisfying solutions, this game is one to savour.

editorialNotes.standard: With relaxed swapping rules and charming graphics, this surprisingly slick match-3 puzzler makes the genre feel fresh again.
Looking for good vibes? This heartwarming puzzler delivers again and again as you help a hen rescue her chicks.

ios.subtitle: Like a jigsaw of your insides.

name: Smart Baby ABC Games: Toddler Kids Learning Apps

editorialNotes.standard: Peek under roofs and rummage through spaceships to track down objects in this delightful time-hopping puzzler.

editorialNotes.standard: Come for the satisfaction of solving mysteries; stay for this unforgettable adventureâ€™s lovable characters and excellent writing.
